Posts.Content: Dec 9, 2012 06:46PM sumi wrote: I had my ooph about 2 months ago. Prior to that I took Lupron. I don't see much difference in anything after the surgery. Still get hotflashes but they're not that bad. My onc felt that the ooph just made it more certain that my estrogen was cut off. And yes it's nice to take one less drug.

Posts.Content: Jul 25, 2012 10:59PM sumi wrote: Bone mets from the start. On tamoxifen, zometa and Lupron. Will likely have an oophorectomy in a few months. My onc and surgeon want to see how I'm doing before deciding on any breast surgery. I'm ok with waiting and in no rush for more procedures. But I do remember being shocked at how my breasts took a complete backseat once they saw the mets. Hang in there.
